text: Hans Tietmeyer (18 August 1931 - 27 December 2016) was a German economist. He was thought to be one of the best experts on international financial matters. He was president of Deutsche Bundesbank from 1993 until 1999 and remained one of the most important figures in finance of the European Union. ==Other websites== * Personal Web site * Tietmeyer's page at the Pontifical Academy of Social Sciences Category:1931 births Category:2016 deaths Category:German bankers Category:German economists Category:People from North Rhine-Westphalia
title: Hans Tietmeyer
